verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron criticized \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3571"\w* woman \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3571"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w*.

“\w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w through|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*?” \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H8085"\w*?” \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w humble|strong="H6035"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w more|strong="H3966"\w* \w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3318"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*. \w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w stepped|strong="H3318"\w* \w forward|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* among \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reveal|strong="H3045"\w* \w Myself|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*; \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* faithful \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4872"\w* \w face|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w face|strong="H6310"\w*, clearly \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w riddles|strong="H2420"\w*; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* sees \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* unafraid \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*?”

So \w the|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6051"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* lifted \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent, \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w became|strong="H6879"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*, white \w as|strong="H6051"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*. Aaron \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w*, \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H6051"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w do|strong="H2403"\w* not \w hold|strong="H7896"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w this|strong="H4994"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H2403"\w* \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H2973"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stillborn infant whose \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* consumed \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w mother|strong="H7358"\w*’s \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4994"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* her!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “If \w her|strong="H5462"\w* father \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w spit|strong="H3417"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* disgrace \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*? \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w confined|strong="H5462"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* back \w in|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w confined|strong="H5462"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w move|strong="H5265"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H5265"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* again.

After \w that|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Hazeroth|strong="H2698"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*.
